snippet: A new proposal to ban plastic foam containers makes sense for the environment and the city budget.
abstract: Editorial welcomes New York Mayor Michael Bloomberg's proposal in his State of the City address to ban plastic foam containers in city; notes ban, which would reduce foam litter and costs associated with its removal from recycling, makes sense for environment and city budget.
lead_paragraph: A new proposal to ban plastic foam containers makes sense for the environment and the city budget.
